transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Accha Biraj Patel baat kar raha hu Neo Polypack se.
Executive: Ha Biraj ji namaskar bataiye Vaibhav bol raha hu mai IndiaMART se. 
Customer: Sir abhi koi inquiry kuch aa nahi rahi hai, kuch kaam ka dhang se kaam nahi ho raha hai. Kya dikkat aa rahi hai?
Executive: Ye profile to mere paas abhi assign hui hai dobara se Vaibhav bol raha hu mai IndiaMART pehle account manager tha aapka. Kal meri Ugesh bhai se baat hui hai.
Customer: Aaj unse ek meeting scheduled hai matlab wo kal exams wagera.
Executive: Koi baat nahi abhi mere se bhi karo aur unse bhi karo.
Customer: Accha abhi use karenge matlab service?
Executive: Ha ji boliye kya karna hai isme?
Executive: Ek second.
Executive: Neo Polypack.
Executive: To Biraj ji aapke aapne IndiaMART application download kiya hai?
Customer: Ji abhi mai desktop pe pada hu.
Executive: Desktop pe hai okay. To ek kaam kariye aap ek baar buyleads me jaaiye.
Customer: Ji buyleads pe hi maine open kiya hai.
Executive: Okay to Biraj ji aap pehle location filter lagaenge jaise matlab jo aapke preference ka hai matlab jaha pe aap dealing karte hai agar aap all over India dealing karte hai Biraj ji?
Customer: Ji kar rahe hai lekin all India kaam nahi ho raha hai. Accha kaam ho waha par wo location pe hum click kare aisa nahi hai. Samjhe Gujarat hai, Maharashtra hai, Rajasthan hai.
Executive: Nearby states.
Executive: Okay ha to nearby states ka filter choose kariye nearby states ka.
Customer: Ha aur upar upar recent likha hoga recent pe click kariye.
Executive: Dekhiye Biraj sir aapko hamesha yahi filter lagana hai thik hai ek proper chota sa demo de raha hu ki kyuki dekhiye maan lijiye jo lead aati hai portal pe na wo aapke alawa matlab char aur supplier purchase kar sakte hai total paanch supplier hi ek lead ko purchase kar sakte hai thik hai. To jo ha matlab wo portal pe sir 10 20 seconds se jyada nahi rahegi Biraj sir. Okay to ha aapko jab bhi IndiaMART open karna hai to yahi filter hamesha lagaai rakhna hai isme aapko lead dekhni hai jo aapke kaam layak lead milegi isi filter me aapko uthani hai thik hai. To ye ho gaya ab isme dekhiye right side me na aap IndiaMART buyleads me hai na buyleads me right?
Customer: Ha ji ha ji.
Executive: Right me dekhiye ha ha yes yes right me thoda sa dekhiye char option ek sath diye hue hai past leads, buyer profile, balance aur help right?
Customer: Ek minute sir mai dekh leta hu right side me bataya na aapne.
Executive: Ha right me ekdam dekhiye niche ki taraf green colour me char options ek sath diye hue hai past leads, buyer profile.
Customer: Green me ji past leads buyer balance help.
Executive: To past leads me jaaiye past leads me.
Customer: Okay usme gaya mai.
Executive: Ab Biraj sir mujhe ek cheez bataiye isme kaun si lead aapke kaam layak hai?
Customer: Matlab jo lead aapko ha.
Executive: Ye apna pehla lead hai wo chale aisa hai lekin sold out likha hua hai.
Customer: Kaun si lead ye Dohad wali Dohad wali?
Customer: Ha Dahod wali.
Executive: Dahod wali sorry ha.
Customer: Aur?
Customer: Aur niche Rajkot wala.
Customer: Abhi usme uska mention nahi hai detail detail mention nahi hai.
Executive: To isme sir dekhiye ye basically wahi aapne sahi pakda ye wo leads hai jo paanch supplier ne aap se pehle purchase kar liya hai right sir to matlab ha matlab sir dekhiye isme koshish ye rahe sir ki hum sari lead purchase kar le agar fir bhi chhut jaati hai na to isme aap I am interested mark kar diya kariye wo leads pe jo aapke kaam layak hai thik hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Jo bhi buyleads aapke kaam layak hai na usme aap I am interested mark kar diya kariye usme buyleads nahi katega jitni chahe utni kar sakte hai sir basically matlab usko samjho ye sold ho gaya hai fir bhi uske upar apne ko interest hai ye wo lead me hai to uske upar apne ko I am interest ha I am interested karke uske upar click karna hai.
Executive: Bas yes sir usse hoga kya ki waisi lead sir in the future aapko agar aati hai IndiaMART portal pe to wo aapko aayegi sir okay matlab ye ek hot product aapka ban jata hai A rank kehte hai yaha pe khair jo bhi hai to please aap sham
Customer: Me ek baar isme se jo achi lead raha kare usme aap I am interested jarur mark kiya kariye thik hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aur dekhiye buyleads easy hai aapko maine filter bata diya nearby states ka aur ye apna jo category product likha hai uske upar kuch nahi karna hai order value aur uske upar?
Executive: To sir dekhiye aapki choice hai mere ko lagta hai ki clients sari leads dekhe aur uske baad purchase kare agar aap wo sab order value wagera ke filter agar aap lagate hai to ho sakta hai ki sir kai baar aisa IndiaMART me hota hai random matlab bahut ikka dukka cases me ki order value bhale mention nahi hota hai lekin wo bulk ki order value nikal jaati hai but aap aapko agar janna hai sir to aapko laga sakte hai but mere hisab se aapko bas nearby states aur recent ka filter lagana hai jisse aap aas paas ke aas paas ke states me sabse fresh lead aap portal pe dekh sake sir okay.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Ye sabse best filter hai aur aap please IndiaMART application bhi download kar lijiye aapke hi number se login hoga wo aapka hi number yaha primary number hai thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Ye kaam kariye uske alawa sir aap lead manager bhi ek baar dekh lijiye lead manager me jaaiye.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: To lead manager me basically sir aapko jo direct inquiry aati hai na IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Wo isme dikhegi matlab dekhiye buyleads to hum bhej hi rahe hai aapko buyleads aap purchase kar rahe hai aapne uska paisa diya IndiaMART ko right but direct inquiry.
Customer: Ha jo apna lead manager dikha raha hai.
Executive: Yes sir.
Customer: Usme activity date ya kuch aisa kuch nahi dalna activity date hi rakhne ka.
Executive: Nahi nahi wo sab wo sab usme koi issue nahi hai activity date wagera kuch nahi.
Executive: Nahi ye dekhiye ye time ke hisab se sorted hai matlab samay ke hisab se sabse sabse pehle jis pe aapne reply kiya ya jo sabse pehle aapko inquiry aayi hai wo sabse top pe dikhegi aur jaise jaise niche jaate jaenge puraani dikhegi thik hai.
Customer: Samajh gaya.
Executive: To isme sir matlab basically agar aap chahte hai usme to dekhiye agar aapko requirement hai sir aapko proper demo ki to aap matlab aap boliye to ek meeting kar lete hai sir matlab video meet agar aapko proper demo chahiye service samajhna hai.
Customer: Wo baat nahi to abhi abhi kar sakte hai?
Executive: Ji abhi bhi kar sakte hai aap ek baar apna mail check kariye Google meet ka link diya hoga sir aapko.
Customer: Ek minute chalo mai open karta hu usko.
Customer: Ek minute ha.
Executive: Yes sir.
Customer: Abhi kya hai maine IndiaMART request likha hua hai.
Executive: Mail mail aapne ye wala mail open kiya hai ye jo Neo Polypack Kalol wala hai ye Neo Polypack Neo Polypack dot Kalol.
Customer: Mera mail id maine open kiya inbox.
Executive: Ha usme dekhiye aaya hoga invitation from an unknown ha yes my name yes.
Customer: To usme join with Google meet.
Executive: Yes exactly usme join with Google meet pe click kariye then join now likh ke aayega join kar lijiye meeting.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Camera wagera required nahi hai agar aapko off rakhna hai off rakhiye.
Customer: Microphone bhi nahi hai apne paas.
Executive: Chalo ye to fir microphone nahi hai.
Customer: Matlab ye mobile se chalega na ye to.
Executive: Rukiye rukiye aap meeting join kar lijiye mai aapko na aapke personal number pe sir ek baar call kar raha hu ye recorded line rehti hai to mai aapko na mai aapko apne jo mera number hai na wo phone number usse aapko call kar raha hu thik hai aap meeting wait kariye ek second.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving inquiries; work not happening properly.



Resolution:

- Executive provided guidance on using filters.

- Explained how leads are purchased by suppliers.

- Suggested marking leads as 'I am interested'.

- Offered a video meeting for a proper demo.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call on personal number.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, filters, lead manager, indiaMART application
